title: Shaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, crisp the pancetta in a pan.
Mix eggs, grated cheese, and pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserve some water. Toss pasta with pancetta, then quickly stir in the egg mixture off the heat.
Add pasta water gradually to create a creamy sauce. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked.
Sauté onions and remaining spices in a pan.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and cooked chicken. Simmer for 10 minutes. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: A hearty, plant-based chili with beans, corn and spicy peppers for a cold day.
instructions: Sauté onion and bell peppers until soft.
Stir in chill powder and other spices.
Add crushed tomatoes, beans, and corn.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot with your choice of toppings (cheese, sour cream, cilantro).
